statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_info;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM supplier_info;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM supplier_info ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id > 100 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM supplier_info WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT * FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Supplier%' OR email IS NULL ORDER BY supplier_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, phone_number FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM contract_information;
SELECT contract_start_date, contract_end_date, delivery_schedule FROM contract_information WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM supplier_information
SELECT * FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id FROM contract_information ORDER BY contract_end_date DESC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_address LIKE '%Ave%'
SELECT * FROM contract_information WHERE contract_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT contract_id, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE contract_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships WHERE relationship_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, contract_start_date FROM suppliers INNER JOIN contracts ON suppliers.supplier_id = contracts.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contract_amount FROM suppliers INNER JOIN contracts ON suppliers.supplier_id = contracts.supplier_id WHERE contract_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE description LIKE '%electronics%';
SELECT contract_id, total_value FROM contracts WHERE total_value > 1000 ORDER BY total_value ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 AND description LIKE '%high quality%';
SELECT contract_id, total_value, delivery_deadline FROM contracts WHERE total_value >= 10000 ORDER BY delivery_deadline DESC;

SELECT deliveries.delivery_id, suppliers.supplier_name, products.product_name FROM deliveries JOIN contracts ON deliveries.contract_id = contracts.contract_id JOIN suppliers ON contracts.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id JOIN products ON contracts.contract_id = products.product_id WHERE deliveries.quantity > 100 ORDER BY deliveries.delivery_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT delivery_id, quantity FROM Deliveries WHERE delivery_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, contact_person FROM Suppliers JOIN VendorRelationships ON Suppliers.supplier_id = VendorRelationships.supplier_id WHERE VendorRelationships.relationship_type = 'Preferred';
